<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Depreciation expense was $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000660" name="us-gaap:Depreciation" contextRef="C_0000887226_20191001_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">240,000</ix:nonFraction> and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000661" name="us-gaap:Depreciation" contextRef="C_0000887226_20181001_20181231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">287,000</ix:nonFraction> for the three months ended December 31, 2019 and 2018, respectively. Depreciation expense was $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000674" name="us-gaap:Depreciation" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">500,000</ix:nonFraction> and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000675" name="us-gaap:Depreciation" contextRef="C_0000887226_20180701_20181231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">563,000</ix:nonFraction> for the six months ended December 31, 2019 and 2018, respectively.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000335" name="us-gaap:LesseeOperatingLeasesTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000335_dcnt_363616c7-3e2d-4408-ac02-4a9b2ee615d5">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">10. <span style="margin-left:36pt;"></span>Leases</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company leases office space for its manufacturing, sales and service operations, vehicles and office equipment under operating leases. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">All of the Company&#8217;s leases are operating leases. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In accordance with Accounting Standard Codification Topic 842 (&#8220;ASC 842&#8221;), the Company has elected not to apply ASC 842 to arrangements with lease terms less than 12 months.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Operating lease right-of-use assets and liabilities are reflected within the captions &#8220;Right-of-use assets&#8221;, &#8220;Short-term operating lease liability&#8221; and &#8220;Long-term operating lease liability&#8221;, respectively, on the Consolidated Balance Sheet. Right-of-use assets, Short-term operating lease liability and Long-term operating lease liability were $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000676" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset" contextRef="C_0000887226_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">3,853,000</ix:nonFraction>, $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000677" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent" contextRef="C_0000887226_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">501,000</ix:nonFraction> and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000678" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent" contextRef="C_0000887226_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">3,404,000</ix:nonFraction> as of December 31, 2019, respectively. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">When readily determinable, the discount rate used to calculate the lease liability is the rate implicit in the lease. Otherwise the Company applied judgement and used its incremental borrowing rate based on the information available at lease commencement. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Some of the leases include one or more renewal or termination options at the Company&#8217;s discretion, which are included in the determination of the lease term if the Company is reasonably certain to exercise the option. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
</ix:nonNumeric><p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">17</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" /><ix:continuation id="F_000335_dcnt_363616c7-3e2d-4408-ac02-4a9b2ee615d5">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="Background-color:#FFFFFF;">There were <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000679" name="us-gaap:RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOperatingLeaseLiability" contextRef="C_0000887226_20191001_20191231" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000680" name="us-gaap:RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOperatingLeaseLiability" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">no</ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction> Right-of-use leased assets obtained in exchange for new operating lease liabilities</span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Century Schoolbook;color:#000000;">&#160;</span><span style="color:#000000;">for the three and six months ended December 31, 2019.</span></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Lease expense, recorded in the cost of sales and selling, general &#38; administrative expense categories in the Consolidated Statement of Operations total $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000681" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeaseExpense" contextRef="C_0000887226_20191001_20191231" decimals="0" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">184,000</ix:nonFraction> and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000682" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeaseExpense" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" decimals="0" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">368,000</ix:nonFraction> for the three and six months ended December 31, 2019, respectively. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Cash paid for operating leases was $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000683" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeasePayments" contextRef="C_0000887226_20191001_20191231" decimals="0" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">183,000</ix:nonFraction> and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000684" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeasePayments" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" decimals="0" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">365,000</ix:nonFraction> during the three and six months ended December 31, 2019, respectively, and is included in operating cash flows.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:5pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:5pt;">&#160;</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000356" name="us-gaap:LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityMaturityTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000356_cnt_1">

<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:continuation>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The weighted average remaining lease term for operating leases was <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000694" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageRemainingLeaseTerm1" contextRef="C_0000887226_20191231" format="ixt-sec:duryear">7</ix:nonNumeric> years and the weighted average discount rate was <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000695" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRatePercent" contextRef="C_0000887226_20191231" decimals="3" scale="-2">5.3</ix:nonFraction>% as of December 31, 2019.&#160;&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:continuation><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000336" name="us-gaap:ProductWarrantyDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" escape="true">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">11.<span style="margin-left:36pt;">Warrant</span>ies </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions generally carry a <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000696"><span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000698">one to three-year</span></span> warranty for parts and a <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000700">one-year</span> warranty for labor and travel related to warranty.&#160;&#160;Product sales to the forest products industry carry a <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000701">three-year</span> warranty for TriCam&#174; sensors.&#160;&#160;Sales of ScanWorks&#174; have a <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000702">one-year</span> warranty for parts.&#160;&#160;Sales of WheelWorks&#174; products have a <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000703">two-year</span> warranty for parts. Off-Line Measurement Solutions generally carry a 12-month warranty after the machine passes the acceptance test or a 15-month warranty from the date of shipment, whichever date comes first, on parts only.  The Company provides reserves for warranties based on its experience and knowledge.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Factors affecting the Company&#8217;s warranty reserve include the number of units sold or in service as well as historical and anticipated rates of claims and cost per claim.&#160;&#160;The Company periodically assess the adequacy of its warranty reserve based on changes in these factors.&#160;&#160;If a special circumstance arises which requires a higher level of warranty, the Company makes a special warranty provision commensurate with the facts.&#160;&#160;Changes to the Company&#8217;s warranty reserve are as follows (in thousands):</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000357" name="us-gaap:ScheduleOfProductWarrantyLiabilityTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" escape="true">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>

<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000337" name="us-gaap:DebtDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000337_dcnt_5288f0af-399b-409c-8b9b-dd0508370506">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">12.<span style="margin-left:36pt;">Credit Facilities</span></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company had <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000716" name="us-gaap:ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable" contextRef="C_0000887226_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000717" name="us-gaap:ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190630" decimals="-3" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">no</ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction> borrowings outstanding under its lines of credit and short-term notes payable at <span style="color:#000000;">December 31, 2019</span> and June&#160;30, 2019, respectively.</p>
</ix:nonNumeric><p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">18</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" /><ix:continuation id="F_000337_dcnt_5288f0af-399b-409c-8b9b-dd0508370506">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">On December 4, 2017, the Company entered into a Loan Agreement (the &#8220;Loan Agreement&#8221;) with Chemical Bank (&#8220;Chemical&#8221;), and related documents, including a Promissory Note.&#160;&#160;The Loan Agreement is an on-demand line of credit and is cancelable at any time by either the Company or Chemical and any amounts outstanding would be immediately due and payable.&#160;&#160;The Loan Agreement is guaranteed by the Company&#8217;s U.S. subsidiaries.&#160;&#160;The Loan Agreement allows for maximum permitted borrowings of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000718" name="us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapacity" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapLineOfCreditFacilityAxis_prcpLoanAgreementMember_20171204" decimals="-5" scale="6">8.0</ix:nonFraction> million.&#160;&#160;The borrowing base is calculated at the lesser of (i) $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000719" name="us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapacity" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapLineOfCreditFacilityAxis_prcpLoanAgreementMember_20171204" decimals="-5" scale="6">8.0</ix:nonFraction> million or (ii) the sum of <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000720" name="prcp:LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapacityPercentageOfEligibleAccountsReceivable" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapLineOfCreditFacilityAxis_prcpLoanAgreementMember_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">80</ix:nonFraction>% of eligible accounts receivable balances of U.S. customers and subject to limitations, certain foreign customers, plus the lesser of <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000721" name="prcp:LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapacityPercentageOfEligibleInventory" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapLineOfCreditFacilityAxis_prcpLoanAgreementMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">50</ix:nonFraction>% of eligible inventory or $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000722" name="prcp:LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapacityInventoryBasedAmount" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapLineOfCreditFacilityAxis_prcpLoanAgreementMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">3.0</ix:nonFraction> million. At <span style="color:#000000;">December 31, 2019</span>, the Company&#8217;s available borrowing under this facility was approximately $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000723" name="us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityCurrentBorrowingCapacity" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapLineOfCreditFacilityAxis_prcpLoanAgreementMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">5.3</ix:nonFraction> million. Security for the Loan Agreement is substantially all of the Company&#8217;s assets in the U.S.&#160;&#160;Interest is calculated at <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000724" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapLineOfCreditFacilityAxis_prcpLoanAgreementMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">2.65</ix:nonFraction>% above the 30 day LIBOR rate. The Company is not allowed to pay cash dividends under the Loan Agreement. The Company had <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000725" name="us-gaap:LineOfCredit" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapLineOfCreditFacilityAxis_prcpLoanAgreementMember_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000726" name="us-gaap:LineOfCredit" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapLineOfCreditFacilityAxis_prcpLoanAgreementMember_20190630" decimals="-3" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">no</ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction> borrowings outstanding under the Loan Agreement at <span style="color:#000000;">December 31, 2019</span> or June&#160;30, 2019.&#160;&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company&#8217;s Brazilian subsidiary (&#8220;Brazil&#8221;) has a credit line and overdraft facility with its current local bank.&#160;&#160;Brazil can borrow a total of B$<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217BRL" id="F_000727" name="us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapacity" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">300,000</ix:nonFraction> (equivalent to approximately $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000728" name="us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapacity" and payable.&#160;&#160;The monthly interest rate for the facility is <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000731" name="prcp:DebtInstrumentMonthlyInterestRate" The Company had <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000730" name="us-gaap:LineOfCredit" contextRef="C_0000887226_srtConsolidatedEntitiesAxis_prcpBrazilSubsidiaryMember_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_prcpForeignCreditLinesAndOverdraftFacilitiesMember_20190630" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000729" name="us-gaap:LineOfCredit" contextRef="C_0000887226_srtConsolidatedEntitiesAxis_prcpBrazilSubsidiaryMember_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_prcpForeignCreditLinesAndOverdraftFacilitiesMember_20191231" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">no</ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction> borrowings under these facilities at <span style="color:#000000;">December 31, 2019</span> and June&#160;30, 2019, respectively.</p></ix:continuation><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000338" name="us-gaap:RestructuringAndRelatedActivitiesDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" escape="true">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">13.<span style="margin-left:36pt;">Severance, Impairment and </span>Other Charges</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In January 2018, a judge in a trade secrets case brought by the Company granted the defendants&#8217; motions for recovery of their attorney fees (see Note 18, &#8220;Commitments and Contingencies&#8221; for further discussion relating to this matter).&#160;&#160;A charge in the amount of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000733" name="us-gaap:LossContingencyAccrualAtCarryingValue" contextRef="C_0000887226_srtLitigationCaseAxis_prcpTradeSecretsCaseMember_20171231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">675,000</ix:nonFraction> was recorded as a liability in the second quarter of fiscal 2018.&#160;&#160;The Company appealed this court decision.&#160;&#160;In January 2019, the Company settled with the defendants and ended its appeal in return for a net payment due to them in the amount of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000734" name="us-gaap:LossContingencyAccrualPayments" contextRef="C_0000887226_srtLitigationCaseAxis_prcpTradeSecretsCaseMember_20190101_20190131" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">66,000</ix:nonFraction>.&#160;&#160;As a result, in the second quarter of fiscal 2019, the Company adjusted the accrual.&#160;&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In the second quarter of fiscal 2020, our President and Chief Executive Officer resigned and the Company had a reduction in force in the U.S.&#160;&#160;The resignation and the action resulted in an accrual of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000735" name="us-gaap:SeveranceCosts1" contextRef="C_0000887226_srtTitleOfIndividualAxis_srtChiefExecutiveOfficerMember_20191001_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">471,000</ix:nonFraction> of severance expense in the second quarter ended December 31, 2019.&#160;&#160;The remaining balance of the accrual was $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000736" name="us-gaap:LossContingencyAccrualAtCarryingValue" contextRef="C_0000887226_20191231" decimals="INF" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">404,000</ix:nonFraction> at December 31, 2019.</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000358" name="prcp:ScheduleOfSeveranceImpairmentAndOtherChargesTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" escape="true">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">These charges recorded as Severance, Impairment and Other Charges are as follows (in thousands):</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<div style="align:left;">

<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000339" name="prcp:CurrentAndLongTermTaxesPayableDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" escape="true">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">14.<span style="margin-left:36pt;">Current and Long-Term Taxes Payable</span></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company acquired current and long-term taxes payable as part of the purchase of Coord3.&#160;&#160;The tax liabilities represent income and payroll related taxes that are payable in accordance with government authorized installment payment plans.&#160;&#160;These installment plans require varying monthly payments through January 2021. </p></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">19</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" /><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000340" name="us-gaap:OtherLiabilitiesDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" escape="true">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">15.<span style="margin-left:36pt;">Other Long-Term Liabilities</span></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Other long-term liabilities at <span style="color:#000000;">December 31, 2019</span> and June&#160;30, 2019 include $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000753" name="us-gaap:OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent" contextRef="C_0000887226_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">548,000</ix:nonFraction> and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000754" name="us-gaap:OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190630" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">556,000</ix:nonFraction>, respectively, for long-term contractual and statutory severance liabilities acquired as part of the purchase of Coord3 that represent amounts that will be payable to employees upon termination of employment.</p></ix:nonNumeric><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000341" name="us-gaap:DisclosureOfCompensationRelatedCostsShareBasedPaymentsTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000341_dcnt_6078c14c-9f8b-4004-981b-68c3f37d389c">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">16.<span style="margin-left:36pt;">Stock-Based Compensation </span></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company maintains a 2004 Stock Incentive Plan (&#8220;2004 Plan&#8221;) covering substantially all company employees, non-employee directors and certain other key persons.&#160;&#160;The 2004 Plan is administered by a committee of the Company&#8217;s Board of Directors: The Management Development, Compensation and Stock Option Committee (&#8220;MDCSOC&#8221;). </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Awards under the 2004 Plan may be in the form of stock options, stock appreciation rights, restricted stock or restricted stock units, performance share awards, director stock purchase rights and deferred stock units, or any combination thereof.&#160;&#160;The terms of the awards are determined by the MDCSOC, except as otherwise specified in the 2004 Plan.&#160;&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:10pt;text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Stock Options</p>
<p style="margin-top:10pt;text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Options outstanding under the 2004 Plan generally become exercisable at <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000755" name="us-gaap:SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardAwardVestingRightsPercentage" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapEmployeeStockOptionMember_us-gaapPlanNameAxis_prcpShareBasedCompensationAwardPlan2004Member_us-gaapVestingAxis_prcpTranche1Through3Member_20190701_20191231" decimals="3" scale="-2">33.3</ix:nonFraction>% per year beginning <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000757" name="prcp:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardPeriodBeforeAwardVesting" contextRef="C_0000887226_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapEmployeeStockOptionMember_us-gaapPlanNameAxis_prcpShareBasedCompensationAwardPlan2004Member_20190701_20191231" format="ixt-sec:durwordsen">one year</ix:nonNumeric> after the date of grant and expire <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000756" name="us-gaap:SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardExpirationPeriod" contextRef="C_0000887226_srtRangeAxis_srtMinimumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapEmployeeStockOptionMember_us-gaapPlanNameAxis_prcpShareBasedCompensationAwardPlan2004Member_20190701_20191231" format="ixt-sec:durwordsen">ten years</ix:nonNumeric> after the date of grant.&#160;&#160;Option prices from options granted under these plans must not be less than the fair market value of the Company&#8217;s stock on the date of grant.&#160;&#160;The Company uses the Black-Scholes model for determining stock option valuations.&#160;&#160;The Black-Scholes model requires subjective assumptions, including future stock price volatility and expected time to exercise, which affect the calculated values.&#160;&#160;The expected term of option exercises is derived from historical data regarding employee exercises and post-vesting employment termination behavior.&#160;&#160;The risk-free rate of return is based on published U.S. Treasury rates in effect for the corresponding expected term.&#160;&#160;The expected volatility is based on historical volatility of the Company&#8217;s stock price.&#160;&#160;These factors could change in the future, which would affect the stock-based compensation expense in future periods.&#160;&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company recognized operating expense for non-cash stock-based compensation costs related to stock options in the amount of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000758" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapEmployeeStockOptionMember_us-gaapPlanNameAxis_prcpShareBasedCompensationAwardPlan2004Member_20191001_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">49,000</ix:nonFraction> and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000759" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapEmployeeStockOptionMember_us-gaapPlanNameAxis_prcpShareBasedCompensationAwardPlan2004Member_20190701_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">105,000</ix:nonFraction> in the three and six months ended December 31, 2019 respectively.&#160;&#160;The Company recognized operating expense for non-cash stock-based compensation costs related to stock options in the amount of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000760" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapEmployeeStockOptionMember_us-gaapPlanNameAxis_prcpShareBasedCompensationAwardPlan2004Member_20181001_20181231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">192,000</ix:nonFraction> and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000761" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapEmployeeStockOptionMember_us-gaapPlanNameAxis_prcpShareBasedCompensationAwardPlan2004Member_20180701_20181231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">283,000</ix:nonFraction> in the three and six months ended December 31, 2018 respectively.&#160;&#160;A<span style="color:#000000;">s of December 31, 2019, the total remaining unrecognized compensation cost related to non-vested stock options amounted to approximately $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000762" name="us-gaap:EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNonvestedAwardsTotalCompensationCostNotYetRecognized" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapEmployeeStockOptionMember_us-gaapPlanNameAxis_prcpShareBasedCompensationAwardPlan2004Member_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">93,000</ix:nonFraction>.&#160;&#160;The Company expects to recognize this cost over a weighted average vesting period of <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000763" name="us-gaap:EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNonvestedAwardsTotalCompensationCostNotYetRecognizedPeriodForRecognition1" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapEmployeeStockOptionMember_us-gaapPlanNameAxis_prcpShareBasedCompensationAwardPlan2004Member_20190701_20191231" format="ixt-sec:duryear">1.7</ix:nonNumeric> years.</span></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: format="ixt:numdotdecimal">33,000</ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction> stock options in the three and six months ended December 31, 2019, respectively.&#160;&#160;The Company granted <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlishares" id="F_000766" name="us-gaap:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsGrantsInPeriodGross" received <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000768" name="us-gaap:ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised" contextRef="C_0000887226_20191001_20191231" decimals="INF" share-based payment arrangements for the three and six months ended December 31, 2018, respectively.</span></p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000360" <p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The estimated fair value as of the date options were granted during the periods presented, using the Black-Scholes option-pricing model, is shown in the table below.</p>

<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:13.34%;">

<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1.32%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:11.34%;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000777" name="us-gaap:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardFairValueAssumptionsRiskFreeInterestRate" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" decimals="4" scale="-2">2.56</ix:nonFraction></p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">%</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1.32%;">

<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">NA</p></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:39.94%;">

<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1.32%;">

<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%;white-space:nowrap;">

</ix:nonNumeric><p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">20</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" /><ix:continuation id="F_000341_dcnt_6078c14c-9f8b-4004-981b-68c3f37d389c" continuedAt="F_000341_dcnt_5b314a6e-b91c-4bd4-a554-3eb01bfd7e96">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Restricted Stock and Restricted Stock Units</span></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company&#8217;s restricted stock and restricted stock units under the 2004 Plan generally have been awarded by four methods, as follows:</p>
<div style="align:left;">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(1)</span></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;color:#000000;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">Awards that are earned based on achieving certain individual and financial performance goals during the initial fiscal year with either a subsequent one<span style="color:#000000;">-</span>year service vesting period or with a one-third vesting requirement on the first, second and third anniversaries of the issuance, provided the individual&#8217;s employment has not terminated prior to the vesting date and are freely transferable after vesting&#59;</p></td></tr></table></div>
<div style="align:left;">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(2)</span></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;color:#000000;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">Awards that are earned based on achieving certain revenue and operating income results with a subsequent one-third vesting requirement on the first, second and third anniversaries of the issuance provided the individual&#8217;s employment has not terminated prior to the vesting date and are freely transferable after vesting&#59;&#160;&#160;</p></td></tr></table></div>
<div style="align:left;">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(3)</span></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;color:#000000;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">Awards to non-management members of the Company&#8217;s Board of Directors with a subsequent one-third vesting requirement on the first, second and third anniversaries of the issuance provided the service of the non-management member of the Board of Directors has not terminated prior to the vesting date and are freely transferable after vesting, and</p></td></tr></table></div>
<div style="align:left;">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(4)</span></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;color:#000000;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">Awards that are granted with a one-third vesting requirement on the first, second and third anniversaries of the issuance provided the individual&#8217;s employment has not terminated prior to the vesting date and are freely transferable after vesting, including restricted stock units granted as part of the Fiscal Year 2018 and Fiscal Year 2019 Long-Term Incentive Compensation Plan.</p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The grant date fair value associated with granted restricted stock is calculated in accordance with ASC 718 <span style="font-style:italic;">&#8220;Compensation &#8211; Stock Compensation&#8221;</span>.&#160;&#160;Compensation expense related to restricted stock awards is based on the closing price of the Company&#8217;s Common Stock on the grant date authorized by the Company&#8217;s MDCSOC, multiplied by the number of restricted stock and restricted stock unit awards expected to be issued and vested and is amortized over the combined performance and service periods.&#160;&#160;The non-cash stock-based compensation expense recorded for restricted stock and restricted stock unit awards for the three and six months ended December 31, 2019, was $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000780" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapRestrictedStockMember_20191001_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">123,000</ix:nonFraction> and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000781" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapRestrictedStockMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">188,000</ix:nonFraction>, respectively.  The non-cash stock-based compensation expense recorded for restricted stock and restricted stock unit awards for the three and six month periods ended December 31, 2018 was $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000782" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapRestrictedStockMember_20181001_20181231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">89,000</ix:nonFraction> and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000783" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapRestrictedStockMember_20180701_20181231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">144,000</ix:nonFraction>, respectively.&#160;&#160;As of December 31, 2019, the total remaining unrecognized compensation cost related to the restricted stock and restricted stock unit awards is approximately $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000784" name="us-gaap:EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNonvestedAwardsTotalCompensationCostNotYetRecognizedShareBasedAwardsOtherThanOptions" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapRestrictedStockMember_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">153,000</ix:nonFraction>. The Company expects to recognize this cost over a weighted average vesting period of <span style="color:#000000;"><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000785" name="us-gaap:EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNonvestedAwardsTotalCompensationCostNotYetRecognizedPeriodForRecognition1" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapRestrictedStockMember_20190701_20191231" format="ixt-sec:duryear">1.2</ix:nonNumeric> years</span>.</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000361" name="us-gaap:ScheduleOfSharebasedCompensationRestrictedStockAndRestrictedStockUnitsActivityTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000361_cnt_1">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">A summary of the status of restricted stock and restricted stock unit awards outstanding at December 31, 2019<span style="color:#000000;"> </span>is presented in the table below.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric><ix:continuation id="F_000361_cnt_1">
<div>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="margin:auto;border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:67.08%;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;;font-size:11pt;font-family:Century Schoolbook;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1.58%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:12.86%;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1.58%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:13.86%;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Weighted Average</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>

<tr>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:67.08%;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:13.86%;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Nonvested</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%;white-space:nowrap;">

<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:12.86%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlishares" id="F_000789" name="us-gaap:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsNonvestedNumber" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapRestrictedStockUnitsRSUMember_20191231" decimals="INF" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">38,111</ix:nonFraction></p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="middle" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1.58%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">$</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:12.86%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD_xbrlishares" id="F_000793" name="us-gaap:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsNonvestedWeightedAverageGrantDateFairValue" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapRestrictedStockUnitsRSUMember_20191231" decimals="2">7.44</ix:nonFraction></p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:1pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
</tr>
</table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:continuation>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Performance Stock Units</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">During the second quarter of fiscal 2020, the Company&#8217;s MDCSOC granted certain employees<span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Century Schoolbook;"> </span>Performance Share Units (&#8220;PSUs&#8221;) as part of the Fiscal Year 2020 Long-Term Incentive Compensation Plan.&#160;&#160;The Performance Measures were defined by the Committee as a specific target level of Revenue and Operating Income Before Incentive Compensation for each of the following: fiscal year 2020, fiscal year 2021 and fiscal year 2022.&#160;&#160;Up to one-third of the PSUs can be earned each year, determined based upon actual performance levels achieved in that year. One half of the award earned each year is based upon the achievement of the <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_prcpTarget" id="F_000794" name="prcp:NumberOfPerformanceTargets" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_prcpOperatingIncomeBasedPerformanceSharesMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">two</ix:nonFraction> Performance Targets in that year, provided that a minimum level of Operating Income Before Incentive Compensation is achieved for that year.&#160;&#160;The actual award level for each year can range from <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000795" name="us-gaap:SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardAwardVestingRightsPercentage" contextRef="C_0000887226_srtRangeAxis_srtMinimumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_prcpRevenueBasedPerformanceSharesMember_us-gaapVestingAxis_prcpTranche1Through3Member_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">50</ix:nonFraction>% to <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000796" name="us-gaap:SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardAwardVestingRightsPercentage" contextRef="C_0000887226_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_prcpRevenueBasedPerformanceSharesMember_us-gaapVestingAxis_prcpTranche1Through3Member_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">150</ix:nonFraction>% (for Revenue Target) or <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000797" name="us-gaap:SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardAwardVestingRightsPercentage" contextRef="C_0000887226_srtRangeAxis_srtMinimumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_prcpOperatingIncomeBasedPerformanceSharesMember_us-gaapVestingAxis_prcpTranche1Through3Member_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">75</ix:nonFraction>% to <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000798" name="us-gaap:SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardAwardVestingRightsPercentage" contextRef="C_0000887226_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_prcpOperatingIncomeBasedPerformanceSharesMember_us-gaapVestingAxis_prcpTranche1Through3Member_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">200</ix:nonFraction>% (for Operating Income Target) of the target awards depending on actual performance levels achieved in each year compared to that year&#8217;s target.  If Operating Income Before Incentive Compensation is less than <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000799" name="us-gaap:SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardAwardVestingRightsPercentage" contextRef="C_0000887226_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapPerformanceSharesMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">75</ix:nonFraction>% of the targeted Operating Income Before Incentive Compensation for the year, then no PSU&#8217;s will vest for that year and the PSU&#8217;s vesting that year will expire.  </p>
</ix:continuation><p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">21</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" /><ix:continuation id="F_000341_dcnt_5b314a6e-b91c-4bd4-a554-3eb01bfd7e96">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">During the second quarter of fiscal 2019, </span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">the Company&#8217;s</span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> MDCSOC granted certain employees PSUs as part of the Fiscal Year 2019 Long-Term Incentive Compensation Plan</span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">, up to one-third of which could be earned in plan year</span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> </span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">2019 (October 1, 2018 to September 30, 2019), fiscal year 2020 and fiscal year 2021 upon the achievement of a specific target level of Revenue and a threshold and specific target level of Operating Income Before In</span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">c</span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">entive Compensation.&#160;&#160;</span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">For </span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">plan year</span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> 2019, actual Revenue and Operating Income Before Incentive Compensation did not meet the </span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">plan year</span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> 2019 </span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">t</span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">argets, resulting in </span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">the forfeiture</span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> of PSU&#8217;s vesting</span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> in plan year 2019</span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">. </span></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">During the second quarter of fiscal 2018, the Company&#8217;s MDCSOC granted certain employees PSUs as part of the Fiscal Year 2018 Long-Term Incentive Compensation Plan, up to one-third of which could be earned in fiscal 2018, fiscal year 2019 and fiscal year 2020 upon the achievement of a specific target level of Revenue and a threshold and specific target level of Operating Income Before Incentive Compensation.&#160;&#160;For fiscal year 2019, actual Revenue and Operating Income Before Incentive Compensation did not meet the fiscal 2019 targets, resulting in the forfeiture of PSU&#8217;s vesting in fiscal 2019. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The non-cash stock-based compensation expense recorded for PSU&#8217;s issued under the Company&#8217;s Fiscal 2020, 2019 and 2018 Long-Term Incentive Compensation Plans during the first quarter of fiscal 2020 was fully reversed in the second quarter of fiscal 2020, because, at this time, the Company estimates that the level of actual performance, as measured against the Operating Income Before Incentive Compensation target levels for fiscal year 2020, will be less than <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000800" name="prcp:ThresholdPerformanceLevelForVestingAwardPercentage" contextRef="C_0000887226_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapPerformanceSharesMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">75</ix:nonFraction>%, of the threshold performance level required for the vesting of these awards in fiscal 2020.  The non-cash stock-based compensation expense recorded for these PSU awards for the <span style="color:#000000;">three and six months ended December&#160;31, 2018 </span>was $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000801" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapPerformanceSharesMember_20181001_20181231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">2,000</ix:nonFraction> and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000802" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapPerformanceSharesMember_20180701_20181231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">67,000</ix:nonFraction>, respectively.&#160;&#160;As of December 31, 2019, the total remaining unrecognized compensation cost related to these PSU awards is approximately $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000803" name="us-gaap:EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNonvestedAwardsTotalCompensationCostNotYetRecognizedShareBasedAwardsOtherThanOptions" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapPerformanceSharesMember_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">144,000</ix:nonFraction>. The Company expects to recognize this cost over a weighted average vesting period of <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000804" name="us-gaap:EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNonvestedAwardsTotalCompensationCostNotYetRecognizedPeriodForRecognition1" contextRef="C_0000887226_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapPerformanceSharesMember_20190701_20191231" format="ixt-sec:duryear">1.7</ix:nonNumeric> years.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">During the second quarter of fiscal 2019, the MDCSOC granted PSUs to the Company&#8217;s interim President and Chief Executive Officer in lieu of a portion of his cash compensation.&#160;&#160;During the three months ended December 31, 2019, the Company recorded expense related to these PSU&#8217;s of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000805" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" contextRef="C_0000887226_srtTitleOfIndividualAxis_prcpInterimPresidentAndChiefExecutiveOfficerMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapPerformanceSharesMember_20191001_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">7,000</ix:nonFraction>.</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000362" name="us-gaap:ScheduleOfNonvestedPerformanceBasedUnitsActivityTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000887226_20190701_20191231" escape="true">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">A summary of the status of the PSUs outstanding at December 31, 2019 is presented in the table below.</p>
